H8050.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Elkanah<SDBH:אֶלְקָנָה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► judge and {L:prophet<SDBH:נָבִיא>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6378.def: = small size container; ► used for storing oil

H8081.def: = high quality {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

H3332.def: = process by which liquids flow from one place to another

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H5401.def: = action with which a person touches her or his lips to another person (usually on the lips or cheek or hand) or to an object ► to show love or respect or devotion; also used when greeting and saying goodbye

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H4886.def: = causative action by which humans apply a liquid like oil or paint to an object by pouring or rubbing ► for the purpose of cleaning, preserving, beautifying, eating, or for consecrating for religious service

H5057.def: = a person in a position of high authority over a nation, a division of priests or levites, or an army

H5159.def: = process by which possessions are transferred from one generation to the next

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H6900.def: = action by which the body of someone who died is laid down in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ not receiving a burial is considered a deep humiliation

H1366.def: = a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it

H1144.def: = man (called {L:Ben-Oni<SDBH:בֶּן־אֹונִי>} by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H860.def: = large, strong, female {L:donkey<SDBH:חֲמֹור>} ► used for riding

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H1245.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5203.def: = process by which ropes that used to be tightly strung begin to hang loose

H1672.def: = state in which humans experience fear, anxiety, or distress ◄ out of uncertainty of what might happen to themselves or their beloved ones; ► which may express itself in trembling and shaking of the body

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

111.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H2498.def: = process by which an object appears in a certain location

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H436.def: = a large-size tree found either alone or in clumps or forests; ◄ one of the varieties of |iQuercus|i*; ► functioned as landmarks, grave marks or gathering places; since its groves were considered sacred by Canaanites, ritual practices under them was always a temptation to Israelites, denounced in the texts as idolatry; ≈ their characteristics made them suitable symbols of a variety of attributes or attitudes

H7969.def: = state in which a countable entity is three in number

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

H3196.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex{N:001}

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H3899.def: = a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H1389.def: = an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a {L:mountain<SDBH:הַר>}

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H5333.def: = relatively tall vertical structure ◄ consisting of salt

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H6293.def: = process by which humans or animals unexpectedly meet other humans or animals while travelling from one location to another

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H3381.def: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

H5035.def: = container ◄ made of a goatskin, the outer side of which has been turned inside; ► used for storing wine

H8596.def: = musical instrument, consisting of a membrane, usually of animal skin, which was stretched over a shallow circular, triangular, or square frame; ► it was struck sharply with one or two hands, depending on where it was situated; it could be held in one hand, under the arm, or against the chest and struck with the other hand, or it could be held on the knees or the ground and struck with one or two hands; the fingers of one hand could be used to tighten or loosen the tension on the membrane as it was struck

H2485.def: = a high-pitched wind instrument consisting of a tube with holes along it, ◄ usually made of wood

H3658.def: = musical instrument consisting of a sound box ◄ made of wood, out of the ends or sides of which projected two arms; the arms supported a crosspiece; strings descended from the crosspiece over the sound box and the number of strings could vary; ► often used to accompany singing

H5012.def: = action by which humans speak or act as a prophet

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H6258.def: = a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

H3320.def: = action by which humans or deities take position in a certain place for a specific purpose

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7626.def: = stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► attribute of a shepherd or a ruler, but also used for other purposes, such as beating, walking, fighting, etc.; ≈ associated with shepherding, authority, punishment

H505.def: = generic term for domesticated oxen, both male and female; ► kept for milk and used for plowing

44.gl: to place (in a position) > to appoint

H8050.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Elkanah<SDBH:אֶלְקָנָה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► judge and {L:prophet<SDBH:נָבִיא>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7626.def: = stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► attribute of a shepherd or a ruler, but also used for other purposes, such as beating, walking, fighting, etc.; ≈ associated with shepherding, authority, punishment

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H7126.def: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus

H1144.def: = man (called {L:Ben-Oni<SDBH:בֶּן־אֹונִי>} by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3920.def: = action by which humans or animals take control of (other) humans, animals, towns or land, usually with violence

91.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H7126.def: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4940.def: = a particular group or class of either people (as in a clan or tribe) or animals (as in a genus or species) that share common characteristics

H3920.def: = action by which humans or animals take control of (other) humans, animals, towns or land, usually with violence

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H7027.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Abiel<SDBH:אֲבִיאֵל>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► father of king {L:Saul<SDBH:שָׁאוּל>}

H1245.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

41.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H2244.def: = process by which liquids become solid, ◄ caused by low temperatures during cold weather

H3627.def: = human-made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

H7323.def: = action by which humans walk at a relatively high speed

H3320.def: = action by which humans or deities take position in a certain place for a specific purpose

H7926.def: = the upper part of the human body between the head and the chest; ≈ associated with heavy burdens, and, in a more figurative way, heave responsibilities

H4605.def: = action by which humans do something to (other) humans or deities that is not in line with the behavior that they committed themselves to

H1361.def: = state in which a person or object is of great or more than average height; ≈ associated with status

H8050.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Elkanah<SDBH:אֶלְקָנָה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► judge and {L:prophet<SDBH:נָבִיא>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H977.def: = action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H3644.def: = fire; ≈ associated with God's punishment, which is too heavy for humans to bear

H2421.def: = process by which humans are alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H8050.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Elkanah<SDBH:אֶלְקָנָה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► judge and {L:prophet<SDBH:נָבִיא>}

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H4410.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H3789.def: = action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

H5117.def: = action by which humans or animals stop their current or regular activities, ► often with the purpose of recovering their strength

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H1390.def: = an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a {L:mountain<SDBH:הַר>}

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H5060.def: = process or action by which the hand or another part of the body of humans gets in brief contact with an object, whether deliberately or not

H1100.def: possible literal meaning: without benefit or without success; hence:  = state in which someone is considered an objectional human being who is engaged in evil behavior and does not contribute to the society in a positive way

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H3467.def: = action by which humans or deities help themselves in a (difficult) situation

H959.def: = state in which someone considers someone or something else unworthy of attention or respect, and shows that by his/her actions

H4503.def: = objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient

H2790.def: = causative action by which someone makes incised marks on a surface of wood or stone with the help of a sharp and hard tool
